mainText:
Hello

I just wanted to write to say I have always admired Steve Jobs as one of the
innovators of the 20th and 21st century.
Apple has always been a company in touch with it's grass roots and pride in
being able to deliver cutting edge products of excellent quality to the end
user.

Thank you Steve for your decades of hard work and visions of the future
office and home.

Deepest respect and gratitude
author: Daniel
